content: Dark Thunder is one of the Transformation Spells you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. It is one of the later game Transformations, found within the Flaming Mountains.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Dark_Thunder.md', within the main section titled 'Dark Thunder'.
The content is as follows:
Dark Thunder is one of the Transformation Spells you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. It is one of the later game Transformations, found within the Flaming Mountains.
